Changelog¶

1.0.1¶

  • Templates were not bundled correctly in 1.0.0

1.0.0¶

  • Python 2/3 Support. Django 1.8 support

0.3.3¶

  • Change status code to 503 #13

0.3.2¶

  • Minor changes to fix deprecation warnings in Django 1.7.
